mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mlike WHERE song_no = #{song_no} AND user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.select: SELECT s.title, ar.artist, al.album,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mlike WHERE song_no = s.no) AS liked ,ar.no AS ar_no, al.no AS al_no FROM mlike l JOIN song s ON l.song_no = s.no JOIN artist ar ON s.artist_no = ar.no JOIN album al ON s.album_no = al.no WHERE user_no = #{user_no} LIMIT ${startIdx},${pageRow}
